name: Balls Of Steel (itch) (BaldRat, Adrián Cortés, Anaïs, MarcalTineo, Estefania, LeGord, Samuel16, Jowent)
name_original: Balls Of Steel (itch) (BaldRat, Adrián Cortés, Anaïs, MarcalTineo, Estefania, LeGord, Samuel16, Jowent)
description:
For my honor.... and my money!!

This is the story of Hiroshi, a yakuza boss who lost everything gambling at the pachinko. Now he is going to take revenge on the other clan's pachinko club and get all his money back.

Will you be able to get back all your money and save your clan's reputation?

The Game

Balls of Steel is a fast-paced third person shooter where you play as Hiroshi, a man that seeks revenge on a yakuza clan. Being a one-man army is difficult. You'll need Balls of Steel!

  • As fast as a bullet: Dash between pachinkos and enemies as if you chose the red pill. 

  • Y'all laggin'?: Slow down time to avoid enemy shots and make everyone walk in slow-mo so you'll have more time to aim. 
  • Get a pin like a Boy Scout: As you take down enemies and act cool your pride will grow and you'll get a piece of your clan's piece. Max out your pride to get advantages! 
  • Jackpot!: If you're causing mayhem in the pachinko parlor, you might as well try to leave with as many balls as possible! Gather the balls your enemies drop. How many can you collect?
Controls Move<WASD>Dash<Space>Shoot<LMB>Aim (Bullet Time if Dashing)<RMB>Reload<R>JumpDash over a ramp Developers
